programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - City Ep6
programme.desc: It’s Halifax through the eyes of its wildest residents. During the day, squirrels and chipmunks compete for territory in the city park. At night, Halifax’s raccoons invade backyards and seagulls scour the streets for pizza.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Highlands Ep7
programme.desc: Cape Breton Highlands National Park was established to protect the primeval forest from clear-cutting – but today the park faces a new threat. Moose, beavers and moths have combined to decimate large sections of the Boreal and Acadian woodlands

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Leaping Into Life Ep1
programme.desc: It’s spring, and the farm is bursting with new life. Watch a ewe give birth to twins, an orphaned Hereford calf struggle to find a surrogate mother, and the top hen nestle down in her maternity coop.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Great Escape Ep2
programme.desc: Experience life on the farm as things heat up for summer. Watch animals swelter in a rare heatwave, try to stay cool in the nearby freshwater stream, and stash supplies for fall.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Change in the Air Ep3
programme.desc: Watch life on the farm adjust as the leaves start to turn, from the sheep whose woolly coats keep them warm during the first frost to the bees that feed on the last bit of nectar before hibernation.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Hunkering Down Ep4
programme.desc: Winter is coming, and the animals take advantage of autumn’s final bounty before the cold, barren months ahead. Watch some creatures search for respite indoors, while others arrive from far northern climates to settle in the ploughed fields.

programme.title: Baboons: Rules of the Troop
programme.desc: Follow four families of four different species - the resourceful Beach Troop, the warlike Desert Troop, the disciplined River Troop, and the peaceful Mountain Band - to find out why these primates are among the most successful animals in Africa.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - The Domino Effect Ep1
programme.desc: Witness some big changes when four cute new arrivals join the nursery classes. And for a handful of adolescent males that are growing too big and boisterous for their babysitters, it’s their last day at forest school.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Dilla’s Surprise Ep2
programme.desc: Crash a fruit-flinging party celebrating the return of Jelapat, Talaken, Bawan, and Rona to the nursery to join the rest of their classmates. Meanwhile, flooding overtakes the pre-release islands, and injuries stifle the progress of two students.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Kesi Turns a Corner Ep3
programme.desc: Watch a milestone moment when two students get their first forest time in years. And another pair of students are confined to the school’s clinic after an accident in the forest leaves Beni with a broken leg and Lala with a broken elbow.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Bears on the Move Ep4
programme.desc: Beni and Lala are going stir crazy in the sick bay, but they must recover before returning to the rough and tumble of class. And at forest school, a termite-foraging lesson inspires class clown Valentino to make a finger-licking discovery.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Wine’s New Friend Ep5
programme.desc: Join two seriously ill orangutans in the medical clinic, where Erik’s head infection is causing concern and fourteen-year-old Mia’s life depends on a blood transfusion. Outside the clinic, the infants find a secret treat hidden inside a rubber tree.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - City Ep6
programme.desc: It’s Halifax through the eyes of its wildest residents. During the day, squirrels and chipmunks compete for territory in the city park. At night, Halifax’s raccoons invade backyards and seagulls scour the streets for pizza.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Dilla’s Surprise Ep2
programme.desc: Crash a fruit-flinging party celebrating the return of Jelapat, Talaken, Bawan, and Rona to the nursery to join the rest of their classmates. Meanwhile, flooding overtakes the pre-release islands, and injuries stifle the progress of two students.

programme.title: After the Wildfires
programme.desc: Charting the long-term recovery of wildlife in the aftermath of Australia’s catastrophic bushfires through stories of hope, human intervention and resilience, this film provides an urgent message to safeguard our environment before it is too late.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Kesi Turns a Corner Ep3

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep38
programme.desc: Scaretrux - Revvit and the Reptools are trapped by Scraptors and create a fake T-Truxto scare them away, only to then have Skrap-It attempt to steal it

programme.title: Where'S Wally? S2 Ep24
programme.desc: Mad About Madagascar - The Wanderers travel to Madagascar to get fresh vanilla for Wizard Flambė. Odlulu is already there; using the Bouncy-Bounce Key to build an ice cream parlor up in a Baobab tree! Before Odlulu gives up the key, Woof playfully takes it and starts a game of game of catch-me-if-you-can. They must catch Woof before the entire island of Madagascar is turned into a bouncy house.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep38
programme.desc: True Romancings / Hardcore Harbor - After Lucy goes on another bad date, Tip and Oh set on a mission to find her a guy; When Oh to shows Elrod around a waterpark, everything goes wrong

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep24
programme.desc: Eyeball - Brian and Akila get trapped inside this weird planet and Brian reprograms a broken Xerx robot and basically, it's like it's their baby. They have to raise it real fast so it can save them from fire monsters and junk.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep19
programme.desc: Mall Is Well / Taco Tank - Turbo competes in a crazy underground race through a mall.//Tito trades in his food truck for a tank and goes on a wild ride through the city.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep24
programme.desc: The Four Flamingos / The Roaring Rooster - Archibald eats too many beets and teams up with lumberjacks for a logging competition. Sage tries to earn all his Roaring Rooster badges in one day.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Furious Fun - The Rescue Riders have a "Dragon Day" to show their skills to a young fan, but Aggro skips it to hang out with her new fun -- but reckless -- friends.

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Pig Trouble In Little Beanotown - When poor Gnasher is laid up wearing the 'collar of shame' Dennis takes Rasher to school instead and disguises her as an exchange student! What Dennis doesn't expect is that Walter will take a shine to the new girl! But once Walter realises the object of his affections is Rasher he is beyond embarrassed and hatches a revenge plan!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep24
programme.desc: I, Clawdia - I, Clawdia Walter and Clawdia are causing mischief for the gang by framing Gnasher for chewing things he shouldn't! It's only when the mayhem gets out of hand that Dennis smells a rat, or rather a cat! Dennis must catch Clawdia in the act and prove Gnasher's innocence before it's too late!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep64
programme.desc: Through Caverns Measureless - When the gang chases Li'l Pequena into the portal, everyone but Puss gets super-powers and must join forces with a sorceress to overthrow the Blind King

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep12
programme.desc: Diapers Are The New Black - King Julien discovers diapers and brings style to his lemur subjects, igniting a fashion war.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free - Riding Academy Ep74
programme.desc: Race To The Finish Part 1 - The girls get summer jobs to help Lucky repair the sprawling house she inherited from her grandfather near the Rosemead Valley Racetrack.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep38
programme.desc: The Partier'S Apprentice / Hair Ball - Guy is running himself ragged trying to be the life of the party for every party in Troll Village. When Poppy suggests he train an apprentice, it seems like the solution to his problems! Until his apprentice starts to surpass his partying skills…/When Smidge accidentally agrees to go with both Milton and Guy to the Troll’s fanciest event, the Hair Ball, she must navigate the difficulties of her situation with help from her friends.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep12
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Sickening Fumes Of Smartsy Fartsy - In order to retrieve Mr. Krupp’s locked up rule book, George and Harold use an invention that ends up turning against them

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S2 Ep35
programme.desc: Mega Fat - After Mega Fat is fired from Baby Corp;he’s forced on the path of recovery towards being a Good Baby. However;Mega Fat is more interested in getting revenge on Boss Baby than finding the perfect family to adopt him.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep12
programme.desc: Sacrifice At The Edge Of Time - The kids are desperate to get back and help their fellow Panda Villagers, and Po decides he must figure out a way to defeat Jindiao before he controls the world

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep64

programme.desc: Rupert And The Magic Books - When Ping Pong says she is too busy to join a story reading day Raggety magically brings the books to life and they fly to Ping Pong's Pagoda, where they start to tell her their stories.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Rupert And The Mischievous Genie - Rupert, Ping Pong, Bill, Edward and Raggety find some magical, musical stepping stones deep in the woods and unwittingly unleash a naughty young genie bent on making mischief.

programme.title: My Life Me Ep19
programme.desc: Love Lessons - Liam's role as romance advisor to the boys of Cosmos High gets under Birch's skin. Offended that Liam thinks female behaviour is nothing more than a collection of symbols, Birch watches as Liam misinterprets Sandra's signals and ends up with pie on his face.

programme.title: My Life Me Ep20
programme.desc: Miss President - Birch runs for school president because she wants to see changes to the Art program at Cosmos High. On a whim, Liam gets involved and soon his goofy antics are winning him favours. Before long, it's an all-out game of one-upmanship between the two cousins

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep71
programme.desc: Slugsy'S Song - Slugsy has found something really special. Only Primrose can be persuaded to go and see it with him. Even she is surprised by what she sees!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep72
programme.desc: Stingo'S Bridge - Webby has told Pip the story of the 3 Billy Goats Gruff. Soon a troll takes up residence under the bridge in the garden and demands food payment every time the tots cross. Can Fifi get to the bottom of the mystery?

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep19
programme.desc: The Great Beanotown Bake Off - Pieface’s all time hero, Cherry Bakewell, is coming to Beanotown to judge the annual bake-off. Pieface wants to make the best pie ever and win the competition but when Dennis discovers Pieface has never actually baked a pie before, he does everything he can to ensure a win, with pie splattering results!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Why So Clonely? - Dennis accidentally clones himself and uses clone Dennis' eagerness to help, to do all his chores and abide by the rules! All is going to plan until Walter realises what has happened and unleashes a clone cat army on the den!

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep10
programme.desc: Rebirth - When a Galra monster descends upon the Balmera, Team Voltron must find a way to save the deteriorating living planet and its alien inhabitants

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep38
programme.desc: Spooktacular / Nicolas-Joseph Cugnot - When Peabody and Sherman accidentally drink a mad scientist's potion, they turn into hideous monsters and put on the spookiest and scariest show ever

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep36
programme.desc: Pounder - Ty and the crew must protect the Flatirons from Pounder, a predatory Poundersaurolophus who marks his territory by hammering everything in sight

programme.desc: Grumblegard, Part 1 - While the others care for baby dragons at the roost, Dak, Winger, Burple and Aggro come face-to-face with a grumpy old dragon on a dangerous island.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep13
programme.desc: Karmageddon / Chet Gets Burned - Turbo is excited to race on a freeway that is closed for construction, but he needs to complete a series of favors for the crew before he can go. // Burn breaks up with Chet after he forgets her birthday. To make Burn jealous, Turbo dresses up as a girl and pretends to be Chet's new girlfriend.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep13
programme.desc: Total Nightmare - When Hookfang is drawn to a female Monstrous Nightmare, Snotlout tries to break them up before he loses his friend forever.

programme.desc: Race To The Finish Part 2 - Determined to save her family home, Lucky signs up to race as a wild card in Rosemead's elite Junior Cup. But winning it all won't be easy.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep13
programme.desc: Model Behavior / Pillow Fight Club - Satin and Chenille put on a fashion show to impress the trendsetter of Troll VillagePoppy and Branch start a massive villagewide pillow battle to determine who gets the pillow of destiny.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep16
programme.desc: Big Top Peabody/Taj Mahal - In a circus-themed show, Peabody and Sherman break their glasses and can't see their circus shenanigans, which creates a wacky spectacle to be seen

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Dang, I'M Rich! / Power Play - Cousin Ashley sets out to strike it rich and buy himself a mansion. Archibald explores Crackridge during a blackout with a new pal.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Songwing Ep1
programme.desc: Secrets Of The Songwing - The Rescue Riders race to save Aggro after she falls under a spell from a unique dragon with a musical call that traps anyone who hears it - and makes them sing.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep25
programme.desc: The Case Of The Rules Of The Game - Pat Pat and the pirates have fallen out over who has won board game and as they've lost the rules they can't agree. They both think they are the winner and refuse to talk to one another. Noddy needs to find the missing rules or they might never be friends again! Noddy launches his investigation and asking the who, what, where, when, why and how questions he follows the clues and eventually finds the rules in Smartysaurus's dinolab. They were blown there by the wind from the Daisy Mill at the farm. Now the pirates and Pat-Pat can agree on who has won the game and are friends again. Good job, Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep26
programme.desc: The Case Of Smartysaurus'S Rainbow Experiment - Noddy's back on the case when something goes wrong with Smartysaurus's rainbow experiment . He needs to investigate. He figures out that the rainbow colours have all been put in a different order. Using his investigation kit and all his who, what, why, where, when and how questions he e follows all the clues - which leads him eventually to Fuse's workshop. Fuse admits that he changed the order of the rainbow test tubes from colour to size order. He's very sorry for ruining the experiment! Noddy helps Smartysaurus reorder the colours and this time the Rainbow experiment is a huge success! Case closed!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep25
programme.desc: What'S The Grumbly Rumbly Noise? - Jess sets out to re-assure his frightened friends by working out what the noise is in the sky that's so loud.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep26
programme.desc: When Will The Snow Come? - Jess is hoping that soon it will snow so that they can make snow kittens and play in the snow like they did last year. First though he has to work out what the weather would have to be like for the snow to come..

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep39
programme.desc: Magnet Mountain - Revvithelps Ty unlock his ultimate power to rescue all their friends trapped inside a magnetized mountain by D-Structs, Splitter, Blayde and Pounde

programme.title: Where'S Wally? S2 Ep25
programme.desc: Norway Out - Odlulu is on the hunt for the Wind Key so she can use it as the world's greatest hair dryer. But the Wind Key is too powerful for Odlulu to handle, so Wally, Wenda and Whitebeard head to Norway to locate the key before Odlulu can find it. Luckily, Whitebeard is a master sailor and can guide the Wanderers through the fjords. Unfortunately, Whitebeard also gets majorly seasick.

programme.desc: A Thuper Hero Thtory - Tip and Oh's plan to save Elrod turns into a battle to save earth from Elrod

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Rupert & The Scarecrow - Rupert and the others meet a sad little scarecrow who's lonely and upset that the crows don't come near him.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Rupert & The Octopus’S Garden - Ping Pong's magic accidentally brings a picture of an Octopus to life and the friends need to stop it causing chaos.

programme.title: My Life Me Ep21
programme.desc: Bad Company - Circumstantial evidence has Birch certain Raffi's fallen in with a bad crowd. His frequent absences, new friends and secretive behaviour point to one thing for Birch who has a hard time convincing her friends. A note, its content misconstrued, finally convinces everyone of Raffi's dire predicament.

programme.title: My Life Me Ep22
programme.desc: Manga Slam - An attempt to quell Liam's manic energy throws Birch into conflict. Does she continue helping her hyperactive cousin learn to relax or does she pull him into the school's Manga Slam? Will Liam become too relaxed or bring a never-before-seen energy to Cosmos High's stage?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep73
programme.desc: Violet'S Flower Festival - Violet is organising a flower festival. She is so busy helping the other tots with their blooms she has neglected hers. Will her flower open in time for the big day?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep74
programme.desc: Pumpkin Pie For Diggly - Diggly is bored of the same old scraps every day. Fifi and Bumble decide to make him a pumpkin pie as a surprise. But there's no flour left to make the pastry, what will they use instead?

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep21
programme.desc: The Wrong Man-Ace - Dennis is mistaken for a Beanotown Baddie while in disguise to sneak into 12A film. At first Dennis loves being treated like a celebrity, but as things begin to go awry his friends have to save him by revealing his real identity and capturing the true diamond stealing baddie!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep604
programme.desc: The Children's Fete-The school roof is leaky again, so the children organize a fair to raise money for a new roof.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep605
programme.desc: The Aquarium-Goldie the Goldfish is feeling a little lonely, so Peppa takes her to the aquarium.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep606
programme.desc: George's Racing Car-It's a beautiful day, but Peppa, George, Daddy Pig, and Grandpa Pig are sitting inside watching racecar driving on television!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Kite-While Anna and Froga are playing with their kite, it gets stuck in the tree. Anna and Froga race to Ron's for help, but when the three friends arrive at the apple tree, their kite and all the apples are missing!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Nap-Anna and her friends decide they should all take a nap to be in shape for their midnight pyjama party, but no one knows the best way to get to sleep and they each offer their own unique way to do it!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Blue's Storytime with Camila-We dive deeper into American Sign Language and the Deaf community. Camila the librarian wants to tell a story with us using ASL, but what story? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep617
programme.desc: Pups Save the Bears / Pups Save a Farmerless Farm-Bears are asleep all over town! programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Pups Save a Lucky Collar-The Paw Patrol must work as a team to overcome some dirty tricks by Mayor Humdinger and pull out a victory!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: The Lost Jelly-When a visitor blows into Carnivore Cove, Baby's communication skills are put to the test.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Lagoon Lemonade-When a heatwave strikes, Baby and William supply the town with Grandpa's world famous Lemonade, but instead of cutting lemons, they cut corners and learn if something's worth doing, it's worth doing right.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Turnip For The Books / Magnet Maelstrom-Sir Steel almost crushes Platinum city with a giant turnip during a Vegetable Show. // When Sir Steel collects metal in the city for Muffin's pooch pamper parlor using a giant magnet, Deer Squad has to think out of the box to stop him.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Paddington Celebrates Mrs Birds Day / Paddington The Table Tennis Champ!-It's Mrs. Bird Day & Paddington wants to make a cake with a Special jar of Marmalade but no one can open it - how will he show his appreciation? // Paddington & Mateo form a table tennis team and the beat the table hogs so everyone can play!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Paddington's Space Adventure-Join Paddington as he takes off & becomes the world's first Bearonaut thanks to the Brown family!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Piggy 500-Starla is excited to race with her prize pig Zippy in the Piggy 500! But when her competitor Crusher and his rude pig Slop cheat and send Zippy far away, it’s up to Blaze, AJ, and Starla to get Zippy back to the race in time.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Fired Up!-When Blaze smells smoke at Axle City’s garage, he calmly and courageously leads his friends outside to safety. Axle City’s fire chief is impressed with Blaze’s courage and thinks maybe he has what it takes to be a fire fighter.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Silver Lasso / The Sea Dragon's Treasure-Santiago and Mami team up to take down an old foe and retrieve a lost family treasure. // After Enrique nabs a Sea Dragon's golden egg, it's up to the good pirates to nab it back before things get out of control.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: The Lost Jelly-When a visitor blows into Carnivore Cove, Baby's communication skills are put to the test.

programme.desc: Party at Sea!-Anchor's away! It's time to celebrate boats with a party at sea! But when a giant ball of snow cone ice threatens to sink the party ship, can the Guppies use their nautical knowledge to save the day-and the party?

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S03 Ep314
programme.desc: The Unidentified Flying Orchestra!-Strings! Brass! Woodwinds! Percussion! After Gil and Molly meet a conductor, the Guppies want to join an orchestra. Led by a conductor from another planet, the Guppies' orchestra will make music that's out of this world!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep320
programme.desc: Talent Day-It is Talent Day at Peppa's daycare. Madame Gazelle wants everyone to show the class their special talent.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep321
programme.desc: Trip to the Moon-Peppa's family go to the museum's moon exhibition with George's friend Edmond Elephant. But Peppa thinks there are going to the real moon and is worried.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep322
programme.desc: Grandpa at the Playground-Grandpa Pig takes Peppa and George to the playground, but does not understand the children's rules.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep323

programme.desc: Hidey Hup - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po drive to the Hidey Hup in the Tubby Car. They enjoy going on the Tubby Bouncy, the Tubby Uppy Downy, the Tubby Spinny and the Tubby Slidey.

programme.desc: Bee - Dee encourages a friend to say 'bee' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of different bees. There are stripy bees, buzzy bees, and yellow, black and fuzzy bees.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep58
programme.desc: Finn Fun - How can Logi-Po join in and play with his pet friend Finn the fish in just the same way that Tinpo plays with his hamster Herman?

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) Ep18
programme.desc: It's time to put on a show - JoJo doesn't know what to do with her odd socks, so Gran Gran suggests they put on a puppet show! The two of them turn the socks into puppets, ready for a show in the garden.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep46
programme.desc: Piggy Blues - Monty discovers Jimmy Jones is sad and tries to cheer him up, but wonders why everyone can't be happy all the time.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep45
programme.desc: Big and Small - Monty is struggling to make a huge gift for Jimmy Jones and starts to wonder if the best things might come in small packages.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep47
programme.desc: Neighbours - Bluey needs her Mum's advice on dealing with a troublesome neighbour, when the serenity of her couch cushion playhouse is threatened by Bingo's own growing stable of animals.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep18
programme.desc: The History Badge - The Squirrels get a very interactive history lesson from Duggee and a host of famous faces from the past!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep17
programme.desc: The Sharing Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels bake a pie and learn how to share by dividing things between everyone equally.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep16
programme.desc: The Philosophy Badge - The Squirrels think about life's big questions, helping Tino the artistic mouse escape a crisis of confidence and gaining their Philosophy badges in the process.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep5
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Artificial Reef - Xuli finds a shipwreck on a coral reef and learns some glitches don't need to be fixed.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep4
programme.desc: Rainforests of Sumatra, Indonesia - Can the Go Jetters save the world's stinkiest plant from becoming Glitch's latest perfume?

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep46
programme.desc: Chickenrat - It's bedtime and Bingo can't remember where she left her beloved Floppy. Retracing their steps, Bingo and Bluey lead their Mum through their bizarre day in the hope of tracking her down.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep45
programme.desc: Kids - A quick trip to the shops proves tricky for Dad, when Bingo and Bluey want to play a game of 'Kids'. Now Bluey is Mum, Bingo's her baby and for Dad however, he is a very naughty boy.

programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: Nothrotheriops & Dung - Andy travels 15,000 years into the past to meets a giant prehistoric sloth. On the way he is stalked by a sabre-toothed cat and rides a colossal Columbian mammoth.

programme.title: Catie's Amazing Machines (S1) Ep14
programme.desc: Propeller Machines - Rally driver Catie shows off three amazing machines that have propellers. She flies a microlight, looks at one of the largest planes in the world and then takes a racing boat for a ride.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S3) Ep11
programme.desc: One of the Crew - Wacky Whirlpool and Pirate Cannons are the games in store for Charlotte, Francesca, Charlie and Ally, as they try to win back Gem's jewels.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep15
programme.desc: The Future Badge - The Squirrels are transported into the future where they encounter a robot version of Duggee - and a few other interesting changes to the clubhouse too!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep14
programme.desc: The Family Photo Badge - The Squirrels learn that friends can be like an extended family, earning their Family Photo Badges and a brilliant group picture in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep13
programme.desc: The Breakfast Badge - Tag's feeling grumpy because he didn't eat his breakfast, uh-oh! Luckily Duggee has his Breakfast Badge, and soon the Squirrels will too.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep3
programme.desc: Bonneville Salt Flats, USA - Xuli and Glitch go head to head as they try to beat the Go Jet Academy land speed record.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep2
programme.desc: The Matterhorn, Italy and Switzerland - Glitch gets into a mountain of trouble as the Go Jetters attempt to climb the Matterhorn.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S16) Ep18
programme.desc: The Christmas Tree Express - It is Christmas on the Island of Sodor. Thomas, Toby and Rheneas are shunting in the Blue Mountain Quarry. Thomas says he is going to pick up a Christmas tree that the Logging Locos have brought from Misty Island.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep14
programme.desc: Bench Blocked - When Sarah and Duck's favourite bench is in use, the pair find other things to do in the park.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep13
programme.desc: Moon Bow - Rainbow gets to experience the night for the first time.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep30
programme.desc: Windmill Girl - When the wind blows fast Nora has to go fast, but when the wind blows slow, Nora has great fun speeding up and slowing down with the wind.

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S3) Ep3
programme.desc: I Slightly Want To Go Home - Lola is very excited about going to Lotta's house for a sleepover, but she soon realises everything is a bit different from her normal bedtime.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep13
programme.desc: The Thing That Was Funny - Bob really wants to see his funny face, so the gang go on the hunt for a dinopaw called OtherBob.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep12
programme.desc: The Thing That Danced - A huge dinopaw blocks the friends' way into wiggly canyon, and won't let them pass until they learn a dance.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep44
programme.desc: Mount Mumandad - Bingo and Bluey have five minutes to bed, just enough time to race to the summit of Mount Mumandad. But for them, facing powerful storms, avalanches and stinky spots will take teamwork.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep12
programme.desc: The Opposites Badge - The Squirrels have fun learning what opposites are, with a little bit of help from a lot of topsy-turvy animal friends!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep11
programme.desc: The Radio Badge - The Squirrels stumble upon some of Duggee's old radio equipment and decide to start their own show.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep10
programme.desc: The Cheese Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels go on a mission to contain an outbreak when Roly inadvertently goes on the run with the world's smelliest cheese, earning their Cheese badges in the process.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep1
programme.desc: Petra, Jordan - Can the Go Jetters rescue the ancient city of Petra when Glitch causes in an earthquake?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep50
programme.desc: The Paddy Fields of China - The Go Jetters swing into action when they discover that Glitch is using real landmarks for his crazy golf course.

programme.title: The Numtums (S2) Ep17

programme.title: The Loud House S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Sitting Bull / The Spies Who Love Me - The older sisters reluctantly let Lynn into their babysitting club but she quickly proves to be too aggressive. // Ronnie Anne wants to go downtown. But her grandparents think it's too dangerous, so they decide to spy on her.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Going Overboard / Walk Don't Run - Ronnie Anne begs Tio Carlos to teach her some moves when she finds out he is a famous skateboarder. // In order to buy a new skateboard, Ronnie Anne and Sid start a dog-walking business.

programme.title: It's Pony S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Ponopoly / President Annie - Annie worries her game night will be too boring, until Pony whips out his custom game, Ponopoly Plus. // The apartment building president tries to keep Annie and Pony from riding the elevator, so Annie decides she'll run for president against her.

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Midden Fleasure / Tread or Alive - Fendrich and his gang learn of Cluster's junkyard treasure, but Harl Cluster, Shirley and Tread unite to protect it. // Snake and Daisy take advantage of Tread's competitive nature to get him to unknowingly act as their getaway driver for a heist.

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Thank Hank / Are the Kids Watching? - Tired of the constant disrespect, Hacksaw Hank quits Fendrich's crew and goes to work for Mary Sinclair. // Lt. Gracie Goodhart joins an Officer Exchange Program and rivals Duke's standing as City's most beloved police officer.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep411
programme.desc: Sick Day - Alvin and Kevin pretend to be sick to miss school and sneak off to the Dagarack Convention.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep412
programme.desc: Crystal Ball Birthday - Annie and Amber offer to plan Brittany's birthday party, pitting her against Jeanette and Eleanor in the process.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep413
programme.desc: Artsy Smartsy - Theodore helps Simon to try and get past his perfectionism in order to complete an art assignment for art class.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep413
programme.desc: The Crush - Simon has a crush on the babysitter and secretly prepares a romantic dinner while Theodore keeps Alvin distracted.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep177
programme.desc: The Good Krabby Name / Move It or Lose It - Mr. Krabs wants all of Bikini Bottom to eat at the Krusty Krab, so SpongeBob and Patrick go on an advertising blitz. // Mr. Krabs and Plankton circulate petitions to see which restaurant will get bulldozed by the city.

programme.title: Danger Force S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Monsty - When Mika tries too hard to win Man's Nest Employee of The Month, she creates a monster that could ruin the telethon Danger Force is hosting.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: Fairly Odder S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Cheater Cheater Cookie Eater - When Viv learns of Rachel's past failures as a Cookie Scout, she wishes they could enter the Mother-Daughter Competition together. Rachel's extreme tactics get them into trouble, but luckily Roy and Ty end up in the perfect position to bail them out.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep204
programme.desc: No Egrets / Meal Ticket - Ronnie Anne and Sid help Casey run his family food truck... at the Yoon Kwon concert! // Sergio is in for a treat when a group of baby birds think he's their mama!

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep424
programme.desc: A Dark & Story Night / Sand Hassles - When the lights go out in the Loud House, the kids entertain themselves by taking turns telling parts of a story. // Lucy and the Morticians' Club try to thwart plans for a school field trip to the beach.

programme.title: Star Trek: Prodigy S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Dream Catcher - The crew has their first away mission on an undiscovered planet that manifests their deepest desires, only to realize the planet has desires of its own.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep199
programme.desc: Sold! / Lame and Fortune - When SpongeBob and Patrick think their homes have been sold, they move away - much to Squidward’s delight. // When fortune cookies start predicting the future, Plankton realizes he can twist them to his own evil schemes.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep200
programme.desc: Goodbye, Krabby Patty? - Mr. Krabs manufactures Krabby Patties on an industrial scale, but it drives a wedge between SpongeBob and Patrick.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep103
programme.desc: POSTBOT 3000 / Boom Goes the Cloud - Angus agrees to compete against Mayor Peeve's new POSTBOT in a 'mail-off' to save the Middlemost Post. // Parker's anxiety escalates when the cloud appears to be the source of loud nightly thundering plaguing the town.

programme.title: The Loud House S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Pulp Friction / Pets Peeved - Lincoln and Clyde submit an Ace Savvy comic to a meet-the-creator contest, but are foiled by a surprising nemesis. // When Lana brings home a new pet, who the kids adore, the four original Loud pets scheme to get rid of him.

programme.title: The Loud House S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Out of the Picture / Room with a Feud - Afraid they'll be forgotten, Lincoln and Clyde want to make a splash in the yearbook and crash group photos. // Seeing his sisters fight with their roommates, Lincoln suggests a room shuffle based on a compatibility test.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Flee Market / Copy Can't - Bobby struggles to give up control of the mercado during his pizza-versary date with Lori. // When Ronnie Anne notices that she's the only person Carlitos won't copy, she's determined to change it!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Away Game / Monster Cash - Abuela worries that Ronnie Anne and Bobby will want to live at their Dad's new apartment instead. // Carl hosts a haunted tour based on Abuela's tale of 'El Cucuy,' and learns that it may not be fiction.

programme.title: It's Pony S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Bad Chicken / Gerry's Tour - Annie and Pony's plan to teach a scrawny chicken confidence backfires when it terrorizes the city. // Annie and Pony try to help Gerry pass the test to become a museum tour guide.

programme.title: It's Pony S01 Ep111
programme.desc: 10 Minute Ticket / Clara Time - In an effort to avoid paying for parking, the whole family must try and keep a visit to the mall to less than 10 minutes. // Annie worries that their friend Clara is avoiding her and Pony.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S02 Ep33
programme.desc: Shanghaied / Gary Takes a Bath - SpongeBob and Patrick work as crew members for The Flying Dutchman. // It's time to give Gary a bath, but he doesn't want to take one.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S02 Ep34
programme.desc: Welcome to the Chum Bucket / Frankendoodle - Mr. Krabs loses SpongeBob's fry cook contract in a bet with Plankton and SpongeBob is forced to go work at the Chum Bucket. // SpongeBob and Pat discover a pencil that makes everything they draw come to life.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S02 Ep35
programme.desc: The Secret Box / Band Geeks - Patrick has a box and won't show SpongeBob what's inside. SpongeBob's curiousity gets the best of him. // Squidward's old rival brags to Squid about his famous marching band. Feeling outdone, Squid says he has a band too.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S02 Ep36
programme.desc: The Graveyard Shift / Krusty Love - While working the graveyard shift, Squidward tells SpongeBob a scary tale. // Ms. Puff pays a visit to the Krusty Krab and Mr. Krabs is instantly smitten with her.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep211
programme.desc: A Tigress Tale - When Master Mugan from the Garnet Palace desides she needs a new Kung Fu Master, Tigress volunteers. Will the Furious Five be minus one or will Po convince Tigress to return to the Jade Palace?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Master and the Panda - When Po's friend Peng returns to the Valley of Peace, everyone is excited...except for Po. What no one else knows is that Peng is actually evil Tai Lung's nephew. Now Po has to admit to powerful Peng that he is the one who skadooshed his uncle.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep210
programme.desc: The Library - A professor leads the kids to a spirit library in the middle of the desert, where Sokka hopes to discover powerful secrets to use against the Fire Nation.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Cat's Cradle - Max the cat is on the run from evil animal control Officer X, and he comes to the penguins for help.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Dr. Blowhole's Revenge - The penguins’ dolphin nemesis, Dr. Blowhole, is out for revenge. After Blowhole takes King Julien hostage, Skipper and gang must rush to rescue their annoying neighbor and stop evil Dr. Blowhole before he destroys the planet.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Out of the Groove / Jungle Law - Julien is horrified when the baboons' dance routine gets more attention than his own. His attempts to sabotage the baboons blow up in his face. // There's a blackout and Julien convinces everyone they should revert to "jungle law" with him as king.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Thug Loaf / Mine All Mine - When SwaySway and Buhdeuce deliver bread to the bad part of Duck Town, things go from quazy to quazier. // SwaySway and Buhdeuce meet the most righteous dude in the planet: the Bread Maker!

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Brendar the Barbarian - Brendar, kicked out of the Royal Order of Warrior Princesses, is left as a "feared and revered" Barbarian. Troll Evan is an aspiring musician who burns his own bridge and convinces Brendar to bring him on her quest to defeat an evil demon.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Dorg Wants a Wand / Dorg Has a Nightmare - The gang fix Patronella's old wand, turning her into Patti Perfect. She starts zapping every imperfection in town. // The pineapple man monster from Dorg's nightmares follows him into the real world!

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Winky / Trivial Per Hoot - Felicity is overwhelmed by the responsibility of owning her first pet, a cute but mischievous creature called a Winky. // Athena loses her confidence when, for the first time ever, she gets a fact about Mythlandia wrong.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Brett Venom, M.D. / Laughquake - Sanjay and Craig infiltrate the hospital to see the world’s first butt transplant. // Sanjay and Craig go on a quest to find the ultimate laugh.

programme.title: Ollie's Pack S01 Ep109
programme.desc: King Swelly Belly / Yard Sale Fail - Ollie and monster gut slug, Jeffrey, team up to help one another win an eating contest and find love. // After Ollie's mom sells his beloved preschool toys at a yard sale, he and CW investigate the suspected buyers.

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Book Report of the Dead / Stan-Arctica - Fanboy uses Kyle's magical Book of the Dead for his book report material and accidentally turns his teacher into a zombie. // Fanboy is horrified when his favorite superhero, Man-Arctica, seemingly dies at the hands of a super villain.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Guard Dog / Dog Save the Queen - When the Chameleon witnesses Snaptrap committing a crime, he agrees to testify against him, and Dudley has to keep him save. // Dudley has to assist the British Undercover Force B.U.F.F. to prevent a Crown Jewel thievery.

programme.title: Winx Club S06 Ep601
programme.desc: Inspiration of Sirenix - Daphne's parents hold a welcome home party to celebrate her return. But the event is interrupted when the Trix send the Beast of the Depths to attack. It's up to the Winx to find the Inspiration of Sirenix and save the party!

programme.title: Winx Club S06 Ep602
programme.desc: The Legendarium - As the fairies of Alfea celebrate Faragonda's 100th anniversary, the Trix take over Cloudtower, teaming up with Selina, a new witch with a very powerful book. Her first target: Pixie Village.

programme.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Purple Jacket / Pizza Pit - An evil tech club lures Donnie with the promise of a gorgeous purple jacket. // It's Pizza Week, the greatest week of the year, but the Turtles' favorite pizza joints keep getting taken out.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep218
programme.desc: Spin the Bottle / There's a Sponge in My Soup - Plankton poses as a wish-granting genie in his latest scheme to get the secret formula. // Mr. Krabs' new Krabby soup is a hit - until some heat-loving hippies move into the soup vat!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep219
programme.desc: Man Ray Returns / Larry the Floor Manager - When Man Ray rents Squidward's house for the weekend, it's up to SpongeBob and Patrick to stop his evil vacation! // Mr. Krabs takes a vacation and makes Larry the Lobster the temporary manager of the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep221
programme.desc: No Pictures, Please / Stuck on the Roof - Patrick leads an enthusiastic stranger on a tour of his favorite places in Bikini Bottom. // SpongeBob is afraid to get off the roof of the Krusty Krab, but he won't let that stop him from living his life!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep222
programme.desc: Krabby Patty Creature Feature / Teacher's Pests - A new secret Krabby Patty formula has disastrous results for Bikini Bottom, and only SpongeBob can save the day. // Mr. Krabs and Plankton have to take boating school classes. Thankfully, SpongeBob's there to show them the ropes!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep158
programme.desc: Sweet and Sour Squidward / The Googly Artiste - Plankton tries to befriend Squidward in an effort to steal the Krabby Patty formula. // Patrick tries desperately to supply everyone in Bikini Bottom with his highly demanded “rocks-with-googly-eyes,” after an art critic deems him a true artiste.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep506
programme.desc: Dr. Sleep - In an effort to be more productive, Simon invents a device that can override the need to sleep. But does it work?

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep507
programme.desc: The Road Warrior - Alvin sounds the alarm when he believes Theodore has joined a motorcycle gang of vampires!

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep507
programme.desc: My Fair Chipette - When Brittany declines Alvin's help for a talent show, he convinces Jeanette to enter, putting them at odds.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep120
programme.desc: King Cloud vs. Smogzilla / Ranch on the Side - When a malevolent Smog Cloud terrorizes Mt. Middlemost, it's up to Parker to stop it. // Parker becomes obsessed with ranch dressing.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep101

programme.desc: Forgeti/Out To Launch/Omni-Copped/Them's Fightin' Words!/Gentle Ben - When Gwen drags Ben along on a hike in search of the legendary Forgeti - a yeti that makes people forget they ever saw it - Ben is dubious.

programme.title: Scoody-Doo! And The Samurai Sword Ep1

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Music Of The Vampire Ep1
programme.desc: Scooby-Doo! Music of the Vampire - When Daphne becomes the star of a vampire film, the production is thrown into chaos when a real vampire shows up, forcing the gang to investigate who's behind the mayhem!

programme.title: Esme & Roy Ep201/Ep252
programme.desc: A Dino-Mite Lunch/The Tillie Show - Tillie loves playing with her Vroom Vroom Dino toys. But when lunchtime rolls around, Tillie doesn’t want to stop playing.

programme.title: Monchhichi Tribe Ep101/Ep152
